ingredients.item: 20 plums, stones removed and finely sliced

instructions.step: Place all of the ingredients, except the Champagne, together in a bowl, cover the bowl with clingfilm andÂ place over a pan of simmering water for 1 hour.
Strain and reserve the liquid, and keep the plum slices to serve with the granola (recipe, page 16) or freeze for future use. Cool down the liquid as soon as possible.
To serve, measure 45ml of the plum liquid, pour into a chilled Champagne flute and top up with chilled Champagne.
